en: We tried to persuade him.

en: I can't find my ticket. I must've lost it.
zh: 我找不到我的票了。我一定是丢了。

en: I lost interest in collecting stamps.
zh: 我对集邮失去了兴趣。

en: Where do I get stamps?

en: Where can I buy stamps?

en: Sign across the stamp.
zh: 在邮票上盖章。

en: Keep that ace up your sleeve. If you're going to show it, have another even further up.
zh: 留一手绝活。如果你要展示它，那就再藏一手更厉害的。

en: Don't hang up!
zh: 别挂断！

en: Don't hang up.
zh: 别挂断。

en: Akagi sprained an ankle during practice so before the game he taped it up until it was stiff as a board.
zh: 赤木在练习中扭伤了脚踝，所以在比赛前他用胶带把它缠得像木板一样硬。

en: When poverty comes in at the door, love flies out the window.

zh: 请给我一条红色带白色斑点的毛巾。

en: The tropical rainforests, located in a narrow region near the equator, are disappearing so fast that by the year 2000 eighty percent of them may be gone.
zh: 位于赤道附近狭窄区域的热带雨林正在迅速消失，到2000年，其中百分之八十可能已经消失。

en: The equator divides the globe into two hemispheres.
zh: 赤道将地球分为两个半球。

en: When everybody's crossing on a red, it's not so scary.
zh: 大家都闯红灯的时候，就没那么可怕了。

en: The red traffic light indicates "stop".

en: It's dangerous for you to cross the street when the light is red.

en: Red is out of fashion.

en: The light changed from red to green.

en: Do you have any in red?

en: The Red Cross supplied the hospital with blood.

en: The Red Cross gets help to disaster victims without delay.

en: Eliminating the deficit will be a hard nut to crack.

en: That's as easy as taking cake from a baby.

en: The loss reached three million yen.

en: What a princess I'd feel like if I were able to go to Akasaka, have a wonderful meal and stay at a hotel.
zh: 如果我能去赤坂，吃一顿美妙的晚餐，住在酒店里，我会觉得自己像个公主。

zh: 如果我能住在赤坂附近的酒店，吃一顿美味的饭菜，我会觉得自己像个公主。

en: Circle in red pencil.

en: Every student trusts Mr Akai because he never breaks his word.
zh: 每个学生都信任赤井先生，因为他从不食言。

en: Hold the baby gently.

en: The baby can't walk yet.

zh: 他小时候很虚弱，现在却很强壮。

zh: 注意别让宝宝靠近炉子。

en: The baby has taken to him.

zh: 有些人喜欢红酒，有些人喜欢白酒。

en: Red wine goes well with meat.
zh: 红酒和肉很搭。

en: Red shows up well against a white background.

en: Red contrasts well with blue.
zh: 红色和蓝色形成鲜明对比。

en: Red and blue paint mixed together give us purple.
zh: 红色和蓝色颜料混合在一起会变成紫色。

en: I need red and black markers or felt-tip pens. Do you have any?
zh: 我需要红色和黑色的马克笔或者毡头笔。你们有吗？

en: I rocked the baby in my arms.
zh: 我抱着婴儿摇晃。

en: It's dangerous to expose babies to strong sunlight.
zh: 让婴儿暴露在强烈的阳光下是很危险的。

en: I shut the door quietly so as not to wake the baby.
zh: 我轻轻地关上门，以免吵醒婴儿。

en: I closed the door quietly so I wouldn't wake the baby up.
zh: 我轻轻地关上门，这样就不会吵醒婴儿。

en: You shouldn't leave the baby alone.
zh: 你不应该把婴儿单独留下。

en: Bringing up a baby is hard work.
zh: 养育婴儿是很辛苦的。

en: Bathe the baby, won't you?
zh: 给婴儿洗个澡，好吗？

en: Please give the baby a bath.
zh: 请给婴儿洗个澡。

en: Could you please give the baby a bath?
zh: 可以请你给婴儿洗个澡吗？

en: Has the baby woken up?
zh: 婴儿醒了吗？

en: The baby was in his birthday suit.
zh: 婴儿光着身子。

en: The baby was naked.
zh: 婴儿是光着身子的。

en: The baby began to cry like anything.
zh: 婴儿开始大哭起来。

en: The baby was sound asleep in her mother's arms.
zh: 婴儿在她妈妈的怀里睡得很香。

en: The baby was fast asleep in her mother's arms.
zh: 婴儿在她妈妈的怀里睡得很熟。

en: The baby was sleeping soundly in his mother's arms.
zh: 婴儿在他妈妈的怀里睡得很香。

en: The baby was in a deep sleep in his mother's arms.
zh: 婴儿在他妈妈的怀里睡得很沉。

en: The baby walked supported by his mother.

en: The baby has gotten rid of its cold.

en: The baby crept into the room.
zh: 婴儿爬进了房间。

en: The baby takes after its father.
zh: 婴儿长得像他爸爸。

en: The baby has been crying for a long time.
zh: 婴儿已经哭了很久了。

en: The baby took another careful step.

en: The baby is sleeping.

en: The baby has pretty little fingers.

en: You may leave the baby with me for two days.
zh: 你可以把宝宝放在我这里两天。

en: Babies are interesting to watch.
zh: 看宝宝很有趣。

en: The baby was crawling on all fours.
zh: 宝宝正在地上爬。

en: The baby cried herself to sleep.
zh: 宝宝哭着睡着了。（女宝宝）

en: The baby cried himself to sleep.
zh: 宝宝哭着睡着了。（男宝宝）

en: The baby is still sleeping.
zh: 宝宝还在睡觉。

en: The baby is sleeping on the bed.
zh: 宝宝在床上睡觉。

en: Why is the baby crying?

en: The baby kept quiet.
zh: 宝宝保持安静。

en: The baby is not bigger than this doll.
zh: 宝宝没有这个娃娃大。

en: The baby is no bigger than this doll.
zh: 宝宝没有这个娃娃大。

en: The baby is fast asleep.
zh: 宝宝睡得很熟。

en: The baby appears hungry all the time.
zh: 宝宝好像总是饿。

en: Please keep quiet, so you don't wake the baby up.
zh: 请安静，别吵醒宝宝。

en: I walked softly for fear of waking the baby.
zh: 我轻轻地走，生怕吵醒宝宝。

en: Have you decided on a name for your new baby?

zh: 我关上了窗户，生怕宝宝着凉。

zh: 我不想宝宝着凉，所以我关上了窗户。

en: As the baby was born, the Tanakas had to hire a part-timer.
zh: 田中家因为生了宝宝，不得不雇一个临时工。

en: Now that they have a baby, the Tanakas had to hire a part-time helper.
zh: 田中家因为有了宝宝，不得不雇一个兼职帮手。

en: The baby caught sight of my ballpoint pen and reached out for it.

en: The baby started to cry.

en: Have you named your new born baby?

en: Any flower will do, so long as it is red.
zh: 什么花都行，只要是红色的。

en: Any flower will do as long as it's red.
zh: 什么花都行，只要是红色的。

en: The red rose made a nice contrast to her white dress.

en: I agree with your opinion about taxes.
zh: 我同意你对税收的看法。

en: What kind of taxes are there?
zh: 有哪些类型的税？

en: The amount of money the government earns in taxes determines the amount of money it can spend on welfare.
zh: 政府收取的税款决定了它在福利方面的支出金额。

en: Please fill out the Customs Declaration Form.
zh: 请填写海关申报表。

en: After getting through customs, I was free to go wherever I wanted.
zh: 通过海关后，我可以自由地去任何我想去的地方。

en: Where is the Customs Service?
zh: 海关服务处在哪里？

en: Where is Customs?
zh: 海关在哪里？

en: The customs officials examined the boxes.
zh: 海关官员检查了这些箱子。

en: There will be long lines at the Customs.
zh: 海关会排长队。

en: Taxes consist of direct taxes and indirect ones.
zh: 税收包括直接税和间接税。

en: Tax wise, it is an attractive arrangement.
zh: 从税务角度来看，这是一个很有吸引力的安排。

en: What's the price per night including all charges?
zh: 包括所有费用在内，每晚的价格是多少？

en: Keep quiet!
zh: 安静！

en: Quietness is a great treasure.
zh: 安静是一种巨大的财富。

en: How large is the population of Shizuoka City?
zh: 静冈市的人口有多少？

en: Is there any difference between the tea from Shizuoka and that from Uzi?
zh: 静冈的茶和宇治的茶有什么区别吗？

en: It is ten years since I came to live in Shizuoka.
zh: 我来静冈居住已经十年了。

en: It's been ten years since I came to live in Shizuoka.
zh: 我来静冈居住已经十年了。

en: I hear there was an earthquake in Shizuoka.
zh: 我听说静冈发生了地震。

en: Suddenly Nancy screamed in the midst of silence.
zh: 突然，南希在寂静中尖叫起来。

en: Silence reigned in the forest.
zh: 森林里一片寂静。

en: Walk quietly, can't you?
zh: 安静地走，行不行？

en: I would tell you if you would just listen quietly.
zh: 如果你能安静地听，我会告诉你的。

en: Let me do my work in peace.
zh: 让我安静地工作吧。

en: It was raining quietly.
zh: 雨静静地下着。

en: Please lie still on the bed.
zh: 请安静地躺在床上。

en: I wish that noise would stop. It gets on my nerves.
zh: 我希望那个噪音能停下来。它让我心烦意乱。

en: Please close the door quietly.
zh: 请安静地关上门。

en: See to it that you keep quiet.
zh: 注意保持安静。

en: Do be quiet!
zh: 安静点！

en: Do be quiet.
zh: 安静点。

en: Be quiet, or the baby will wake up.
zh: 安静点，不然会吵醒宝宝的。

en: If you aren't quiet, the baby will wake up.
zh: 如果你不安静，宝宝会被吵醒的。

en: Why don't you be quiet?
zh: 你为什么不能安静点呢？

en: Keep quiet and behave well!
zh: 保持安静，好好表现！

en: Quiet down, please.
zh: 请安静下来。

en: You may stay here as long as you keep quiet.
zh: 只要你保持安静，你就可以待在这里。

en: You may be here as long as you keep quiet.
zh: 只要你保持安静，你就可以待在这里。

en: I wish you would be quiet.
zh: 我希望你能安静点。

en: Keep silent, or I will throw you out of here.
zh: 保持沉默，不然我就把你扔出去。

en: Let's keep quiet.
zh: 我们保持安静吧。

en: Keep quiet.
zh: 安静。

en: You must keep quiet.
zh: 你必须保持安静。

en: So long as you keep quiet, you can stay in this room.
zh: 只要你保持安静，你就可以待在这个房间里。

en: As long as you keep quiet, you can stay in this room.
zh: 只要你保持安静，你就可以待在这个房间里。

en: You may stay here if you like, so long as you keep quiet.
zh: 如果你愿意，你可以待在这里，只要你保持安静。

en: You may stay here if you like, as long as you keep quiet.
zh: 如果你愿意，你可以待在这里，只要你保持安静。

en: Be quiet and listen to me.
zh: 安静，听我说。

en: You can stay if only you are quiet.
zh: 只要你安静，你就可以留下来。

en: You can stay only if you are quiet.
zh: 只有你安静，你才能留下来。

en: You can stay only if you're quiet.
zh: 只有你安静，你才能留下来。

en: Be quiet. Don't talk in class.
zh: 安静。上课不要说话。

en: Be quiet. The kids are asleep.
zh: 安静。孩子们睡着了。

en: Be quiet. Don't talk in the theater.
zh: 安静。不要在剧院里说话。

en: Hush!
zh: 嘘！

en: Quiet!
zh: 安静！

en: Silence!
zh: 肃静！

en: Pipe down!
zh: 安静点！

en: Pipe down.
zh: 安静点。

en: It was a quiet night.
zh: 那是个安静的夜晚。

en: I would like to live in the quiet country.
zh: 我想住在安静的乡村。

en: The calm surface reflected her features like a mirror.
zh: 平静的湖面像镜子一样映出她的容貌。

en: Soft music is often conducive to sleep.
zh: 柔和的音乐通常有助于睡眠。

en: He was a dark figure with a pale face.
zh: 他是一个脸色苍白的黑影。

en: His pale face showed a flush of excitement.
zh: 他苍白的脸上泛起兴奋的红晕。

en: The rising generation always have some funny ideas.
zh: 年轻一代总有一些奇怪的想法。

en: Moral and physical development are remarkable in the youth.
zh: 道德和身体的发展在青年时期是显著的。

en: His perseverance and diligence in his youth have made him what he is today.
zh: 他青年时代的毅力和勤奋成就了今天的他。

en: Make good friends and read good books in youth.
zh: 在青年时代结交好朋友，阅读好书。

en: It is said that adolescent friendships do not often last.
zh: 据说青少年时期的友谊通常不会持久。

en: Adolescence is viewed as time of transition.
zh: 青春期被视为过渡时期。

en: The young man was disappointed in love.
zh: 这个年轻人失恋了。

en: A group of young men are playing handball in the playground.
zh: 一群年轻人在操场上打手球。

en: As is often the case with young men, he is indifferent to money.
zh: 就像年轻人常有的情况一样，他对金钱漠不关心。

en: The first great lesson that a young man should learn is that he knows nothing.
zh: 年轻人应该学到的第一个重要教训是他一无所知。

en: That's big talk for an upstart like you.
zh: 你这种新人说大话。

en: Aota was not worthy of your trust.
zh: 青田不值得你信任。

en: Bronze is composed of copper and tin.
zh: 青铜是由铜和锡组成的。

en: He was completely cleared of the charge against him.
zh: 他被彻底洗清了对他的指控。

en: The economy of Aomori Prefecture depends heavily on apple growing.
zh: 青森县的经济很大程度上依赖于苹果种植。

en: Aomori is famous for its good apples.
zh: 青森以其优质苹果而闻名。

en: Only cross the street on the green light.
zh: 只能在绿灯亮时过马路。

en: A green light is on.
zh: 绿灯亮了。

en: Start off on the green light.
zh: 绿灯亮时开始。

en: Do you have any in blue?
zh: 你们有蓝色的吗？

en: Juvenile delinquency is on the increase at a rapid pace.
zh: 青少年犯罪正在迅速增加。

en: Do not idle away your youth or you will regret it later.
zh: 不要虚度你的青春，否则你以后会后悔的。

en: Adolescents often quarrel with their parents.
zh: 青少年经常和父母吵架。

en: How long adolescence continues is determined by biological factors.
zh: 青春期持续多久取决于生物因素。

en: I regret having idled away my youth.
zh: 我后悔虚度了我的青春。

en: Mr Aoyama has a large family to support.
zh: 青山先生要养活一个大家庭。

en: Mr. Aoyama has a large family to support.
zh: 青山先生要养活一个大家庭。

en: Be utterly dejected.
zh: 彻底沮丧。

en: Nothing was to be seen but the blue sky.
zh: 除了蓝天，什么也看不见。

en: Paint the trees against the background of the blue sky.
zh: 以蓝天为背景，画出树木。

en: The tower was seen clearly against the blue sky.
zh: 在蓝天的映衬下，这座塔清晰可见。

en: I go up to the rooftop when I want to see the blue sky.
zh: 我想看蓝天的时候，就上到屋顶。

en: Clouds were floating in the blue sky.
zh: 云朵在蓝天中飘浮。

en: I was deceived by the blue sky and brought no umbrella.
zh: 我被蓝天欺骗了，没带伞。

en: The blue sky fooled me so I didn't bring an umbrella.
zh: 蓝天骗了我，所以我没带伞。

en: The green light is the "go" signal.
zh: 绿灯是“通行”信号。

en: The girl with blue eyes is Jane.
zh: 那个蓝眼睛的女孩是简。

en: The warm sunlight is full upon the green wheat field.
zh: 温暖的阳光洒满了绿色的麦田。

en: The bluebird carries the sky on his back.
zh: 蓝鸟背负着天空。

en: God appointed blue to be an everlasting source of delight.
zh: 上帝指定蓝色作为永恒快乐的源泉。

en: Blend the blue paint with the yellow paint.
zh: 将蓝色颜料和黄色颜料混合。

en: A green banana is not ripe enough to eat.
zh: 绿色的香蕉还没熟透，不能吃。

en: The blue sports car came to a screeching halt.
zh: 蓝色的跑车嘎吱一声停了下来。

en: A blue suit, white shirt and red tie are essential for all male workers.
zh: 蓝色西装、白色衬衫和红色领带是所有男性员工的必备品。

en: The bill came to over $25.
zh: 账单超过了25美元。

en: Our records show that the invoice No.1111 is still outstanding.
zh: 我们的记录显示，1111号发票仍然未付。

en: The bill added up to three thousand dollars.
zh: 账单总计三千美元。

en: I thought it strange that the petition had been turned down.
zh: 我认为请愿书被驳回很奇怪。

en: Seiko accepted his dinner invitation.
zh: 精工接受了他的晚餐邀请。

en: Upon my word I will do it.
zh: 我以我的名誉担保，我会做到的。

en: I never told anybody about it, I swear.
zh: 我从未告诉任何人这件事，我发誓。

en: I swear, John.
zh: 我发誓，约翰。

en: If only you work sincerely, you will be trusted.
zh: 只要你真诚地工作，你就会被信任。

en: Poverty with honesty is preferable to wealth obtained by unfair means.
zh: 诚实的贫穷胜过用不正当手段获得的财富。

en: Looking for somebody sincere, open-minded, thoughtful.
zh: 寻找真诚、思想开放、体贴的人。

en: You can be dismissed for dishonesty.
zh: 你可以因不诚实而被解雇。

en: It is my belief that sincerity will be rewarded in the end.
zh: 我坚信真诚最终会得到回报。

en: Nothing is more important than sincerity.
zh: 没有什么比真诚更重要。

en: Honesty seems to be rather at a discount.
zh: 诚实似乎相当不值钱。

en: All he has going for him is his reliability.
zh: 他唯一能依靠的就是他的可靠性。

en: Westerners, in general, prefer to avoid such topics unless the other person brings them up.
zh: 一般来说，除非对方主动提起，否则西方人更喜欢避免此类话题。

en: Some Westerners may think our houses are lacking in everything they consider essential.
zh: 一些西方人可能认为我们的房子缺乏他们认为必不可少的一切。

en: When I speak to a Westerner, I have to shift mental gears, so to speak.
zh: 跟西方人说话时，我得转换一下思路，可以这么说。

en: You must be careful when talking to a European.
zh: 和欧洲人说话时你必须小心。

en: Some people claim that there are no more heroes in the Western world.
zh: 有些人声称西方世界已经没有英雄了。

en: Horseradish tastes good on roast beef sandwiches.
zh: 辣根酱配烤牛肉三明治很好吃。

en: Many western customs have taken root in Japan.
zh: 许多西方习俗已经在日本扎根。

en: Individuality is stressed in the Western world.
zh: 西方世界强调个性。

en: In most Western countries, young people come of age at 18 or 21.
zh: 在大多数西方国家，年轻人会在18岁或21岁成年。

en: Individuality is very important in the West.
zh: 个性在西方非常重要。

en: Western nations have to put their heads together to strengthen the dollar.
zh: 西方国家必须集思广益，以增强美元。

en: Western countries are jumping on Japan for its stance on the issue.
zh: 西方国家正因为日本在此问题上的立场而向其施压。

en: Western thought is consistent.
zh: 西方思想是一致的。

en: Kyouichi Saionji, who he supposed would win the duel, has lost.
zh: 西园寺恭一，他本以为会赢得决斗，却输了。

en: The western sky glows crimson.
zh: 西方的天空闪耀着深红色。

en: The western sky glowed with crimson.
zh: 西方的天空闪耀着深红色。

en: Sadako watched the sun lowering in the west and became blind.
zh: 贞子看着太阳在西方落下，然后失明了。

en: Selling products sometimes requires having a stroke of genius.
zh: 销售产品有时需要灵光一闪。

en: Any industrial property rights relating to the Product Specification shall belong to ABC Inc.
zh: 与产品规格有关的任何工业产权应属于ABC公司。

en: We can deliver the product in June.
zh: 我们可以在六月份交付产品。

en: The manufacturing sector is a frenzy over the new monetary policy.
zh: 制造业正因新的货币政策而疯狂。

en: I estimate the production costs to be 36 percent of the budget.
zh: 我估计生产成本占预算的36%。

en: The date of manufacture is shown on the lid.
zh: 生产日期显示在盖子上。

en: Manufacturers are liable for defects in their products.
zh: 制造商对产品的缺陷负责。

en: The best way for adjusting the gap between the internal and the external price and securing economic growth is to promote the non-manufacturing industry's productivity by aggressive investing in facilities.
zh: 调整内外价格差距、确保经济增长的最佳途径是通过积极投资设备来提高非制造业的生产力。

en: The cheering ceased.
zh: 欢呼声停止了。

en: I recognized Jane at once by her voice.
zh: 我立刻凭声音认出了简。

en: Read the book aloud.
zh: 大声朗读书本。

en: He said it out loud.
zh: 他大声地说了出来。

en: Read it aloud.
zh: 大声读出来。

en: Tone of voice can indicate anger and irony.
zh: 语调可以表达愤怒和讽刺。

en: Tone of voice can indicate feelings.
zh: 语调可以表达情感。

en: Spirit manifested itself.
zh: 圣灵显现。

en: The man on whom you see the Spirit come down and remain is he who will baptize with the Holy Spirit.
zh: 你看见圣灵降下来，住在谁身上，谁就是用圣灵施洗的。

en: The priest seems to make it a practice to climb on the underdog's bandwagon and persuade the other side to compromise.
zh: 这位牧师似乎惯于攀附弱者，并说服对方妥协。

en: This is the first time for me to read the Bible.
zh: 这是我第一次读圣经。

en: Every time I read the Bible, I am deeply moved.
zh: 每次我读圣经，我都会深受感动。

en: It is quite common now to meet with young people who do not know the Bible.
zh: 现在遇到不了解圣经的年轻人是很常见的。

en: The Bible sells more than one million copies every year.
zh: 圣经每年销量超过一百万册。

en: The Bible tells us that we should love our neighbors.
zh: 圣经告诉我们应该爱我们的邻居。

en: According to the Bible, God made the world in six days.
zh: 根据圣经，上帝在六天内创造了世界。

en: Much wisdom is to be found in the Bible.
zh: 许多智慧都可以在圣经中找到。

en: The Bible has it written like this.
zh: 圣经是这样写的。

en: As in the Bible, man may not be always perfect.
zh: 正如圣经所说，人可能并不总是完美的。

en: Then they believed the scripture and the words that Jesus had spoken.
zh: 然后他们就信了经上的话和耶稣所说的。

en: The holy man tiptoed his way across the Ganges.
zh: 那位圣人蹑手蹑脚地走过恒河。

en: I can't say that Mr. Kelly has lived a saint's life.
zh: 我不能说凯利先生过着圣徒般的生活。

en: I also heard that it'd been awful around the Olympic Flame.
zh: 我还听说奥运圣火周围的情况很糟糕。

en: It was almost a decade ago, on May 8th, 1980, that Mount St. Helens erupted.
zh: 大约十年前，1980年5月8日，圣海伦火山爆发了。

en: I'd like you to have a thorough examination.
zh: 我想让你做一次彻底的检查。

en: Mental exercise is particularly important for young children.
zh: 精神锻炼对幼儿尤为重要。

en: I'll give you moral support.
zh: 我会给你精神上的支持。

en: Mental health is as important as physical health.
zh: 心理健康和身体健康一样重要。

en: As the psychiatrist nodded, he said this.
zh: 精神科医生点点头，说道。

en: The mind should be developed along with the body.
zh: 身心应该一起发展。

en: It is said that this hot water brings a balance between body and mind.
zh: 据说这热水能使身心达到平衡。

en: Try hard.
zh: 努力尝试。

en: Try as hard as you can.
zh: 尽你所能地尝试。

en: Try to do it to the best of your abilities.
zh: 尽你所能地去做。

en: I'll try to explain it to you to the best of my ability.
zh: 我会尽我所能向你解释。

en: Professor Morita presided at a meeting of the Chemical Society.
zh: 森田教授主持了化学学会的会议。

en: You don't have to dress up.
zh: 你不用打扮。

en: I love this arrangement.
zh: 我喜欢这个布置。

en: Where are the sanitary napkins?
zh: 卫生巾在哪里？

en: Human physiology is a three-credit course.
zh: 人类生理学是一门三学分的课程。

en: I have bad cramps when I have my period.
zh: 我来月经的时候痛经很厉害。

en: Is your menstruation normal?
zh: 你的月经正常吗？

en: My period is regular.
zh: 我的月经很规律。

en: I have very heavy periods.
zh: 我的月经量很大。

en: My menstrual cycle is irregular.
zh: 我的月经周期不规律。

en: I missed a period.
zh: 我停经了。

en: I don't menstruate.
zh: 我不来月经。

en: My period is five weeks late.
zh: 我月经迟了五个星期。

en: I can't eat a raw egg; it must be cooked.
zh: 我不能吃生鸡蛋，必须煮熟。

en: I can't eat raw eggs. They have to be cooked.
zh: 我不能吃生鸡蛋。它们必须煮熟。

en: Don't make light of life.
zh: 不要轻视生命。

en: I wonder if life exists on other planets.
zh: 我想知道其他星球上是否存在生命。

en: I wonder whether life exists on other planets.
zh: 我想知道其他星球上是否存在生命。

en: Life is all in all.
zh: 生命就是一切。

en: When did life come into being?
zh: 生命是什么时候出现的？

en: Those who have never thought about the value of life should not study medicine.
zh: 那些从未思考过生命价值的人不应该学医。

en: The mystery of life is beyond human understanding.
zh: 生命的奥秘超出了人类的理解范围。

en: There are many theories about the origin of life.
zh: 关于生命的起源有很多理论。

en: How and when life began is still a mystery.
zh: 生命是如何以及何时开始的仍然是一个谜。

en: A little knowledge is a dangerous thing.
zh: 一知半解是危险的。

en: The biologist concentrated on observing the phenomenon.
zh: 这位生物学家专注于观察这种现象。

en: Biologists assert the losses are severe.
zh: 生物学家断言损失惨重。

en: I took my degree in biology.
zh: 我获得了生物学学位。

en: No living things could live without oxygen.
zh: 没有生物可以离开氧气而生存。

en: Living organisms had existed on earth, without ever knowing why, for over three thousand million years before the truth finally dawned on one of them.
zh: 在真相最终降临到其中一个生物身上之前，生物已经在地球上存在了超过三十亿年，却从未知道为什么。

en: It is easy to consider man unique among living organisms.
zh: 人们很容易认为人类在生物中是独一无二的。

en: May I have your birth date?
zh: 请问您的出生日期是哪天？

en: I was born on February 14, 1960.
zh: 我出生于1960年2月14日。

en: His speech made a deep impression on the students.
zh: 他的演讲给学生们留下了深刻的印象。

en: The students bowed to their teacher.
zh: 学生们向他们的老师鞠躬。

en: The pupils stand up when their teacher enters.
zh: 当老师进来时，学生们会站起来。

en: Students stand up when their teacher enters.
zh: 当老师进来时，学生们会站起来。

en: The pupils did the work themselves.
zh: 学生们自己完成了这项工作。

en: The students did the work themselves.

en: The students found the final examination to be a breeze.

zh: 中午他们躺在森林里休息。

en: At noon, I have lunch with my classmates.
zh: 中午我和同学们一起吃午饭。

en: I'll call you at noon.
zh: 我中午给你打电话。

en: It has been raining on and off since noon.
zh: 从中午开始就断断续续地下雨。

en: At the New Year, we spend a lot of time with our family.
zh: 过新年的时候，我们花很多时间和家人在一起。

en: New Year's Day is close at hand.
zh: 元旦就在眼前了。

en: Justice will assert itself.
zh: 正义终将伸张。

en: Let us be united in the cause of justice.
zh: 让我们为了正义的事业团结起来。

en: I fight in the cause of justice.
zh: 我为正义而战。

en: Justice and kindness are virtues.
zh: 正义和善良是美德。

en: When I came to myself, I was in the hospital.
zh: 当我醒来的时候，我在医院里。

en: When I came to, I found myself lying on the floor.
zh: 当我醒来时，我发现自己躺在地板上。

en: Are you losing your mind?
zh: 你是不是疯了？

en: He came to himself.
zh: 他清醒过来了。

en: Specifically, I'm a university lecturer.
zh: 具体来说，我是一名大学讲师。

en: I'm actually a university teacher.
zh: 我实际上是一名大学老师。

en: To be accurate, he is to blame.
zh: 准确地说，他应该受到责备。

en: What is the right time?
zh: 现在几点？

en: I do not know exactly.
zh: 我不太清楚。

en: The exact time is three now.
zh: 现在正好三点。

en: I'd like to know the exact time.
zh: 我想知道准确的时间。

en: I forgot what the exact price was, but it was about 170 dollars.
zh: 我忘了确切的价格是多少，但大概是170美元左右。

en: Can you tell me the exact time, please?
zh: 请问现在几点？

en: Tell me the right time, please.
zh: 请告诉我准确的时间。

en: Please tell me the correct time.
zh: 请告诉我正确的时间。

en: What is the exact time?
zh: 现在几点？

en: Do not rely on the room clock for the accurate time of day.
zh: 不要依赖房间里的钟来获取准确的时间。

en: The exact temperature is 22.68 degrees Celsius.
zh: 准确的温度是22.68摄氏度。

en: I refer you to the dictionary for the correct spelling.
zh: 关于正确的拼写，请参考字典。

en: Please circle the right answer.
zh: 请圈出正确的答案。

en: Please check the correct answer.
zh: 请检查正确的答案。

en: Please mark the correct answer.
zh: 请标记正确的答案。

en: Tadashi has a soft voice.
zh: 忠的声音很轻。

en: That's what I thought.
zh: 我也是这么想的。

en: Properly used, certain poisons will prove beneficial.
zh: 如果使用得当，某些毒药会证明是有益的。

en: Cross out the incorrect words.
zh: 划掉不正确的词语。

en: Mark the right answer.
zh: 标记正确的答案。

en: Mark the correct answer.
zh: 标记正确的答案。

en: What's the right time?
zh: 现在几点？

en: Nothing is ever right.
zh: 没有什么是永远正确的。

en: Do what you believe is right.
zh: 做你认为正确的事。

en: You ought to have the courage to speak out what you believe to be right.
zh: 你应该有勇气说出你认为正确的事情。

en: Do whatever you think is right.
zh: 做你认为正确的任何事。

en: Do that which is right.
zh: 做正确的事。

en: Do what is right.
zh: 做正确的事。

en: It is sometimes hard to tell right from wrong.
zh: 有时候很难分辨对错。

en: You should take advantage of the good weather to paint the fence.
zh: 你应该利用好天气来粉刷栅栏。

en: In spite of the sunny weather, the air was rather chilly.
zh: 尽管天气晴朗，空气仍然相当寒冷。

en: I sometimes wish I could live a quiet retired sort of life but I doubt I could stand it for more than a few days.
zh: 我有时希望我能过一种安静的退休生活，但我怀疑我是否能忍受超过几天。

en: Rain or shine, the postman delivers the mail.
zh: 风雨无阻，邮递员都会送信。

en: Rain or shine, I will go.
zh: 风雨无阻，我会去。

en: Rain or shine, the athletic meet will be held.
zh: 无论晴雨，运动会都将举行。

en: Rain or shine, the opening ceremony is to begin at nine.
zh: 无论晴雨，开幕式都将在九点开始。

en: Fair, later cloudy.
zh: 晴，晚些时候多云。

en: It is clearing up.
zh: 天晴了。

en: I hope it will be nice.
zh: 我希望天气会好。

en: If the weather clears up, we'll go for a walk in the forest.
zh: 如果天气放晴，我们就去森林里散步。

en: I wonder if it will be nice.
zh: 不知道天气会不会好。

en: I wonder if it will be sunny outside.
zh: 不知道外面是不是晴天。

en: I thought it was going to clear up. On the contrary, it began to rain.
zh: 我以为天要晴了。相反，开始下雨了。

en: I think it will be fine.
zh: 我觉得天气会很好。

en: I hope it will be fine.
zh: 我希望天气会很好。

en: I don't suppose it's going to be sunny.
zh: 我不认为会是晴天。

en: We can see Mt. Fuji far away on a fine day.
zh: 晴朗的日子，我们可以远远地看到富士山。

en: On a clear day, we can see Mt. Fuji in the distance.
zh: 晴天的时候，我们可以远远地看到富士山。

en: The skies won't be clear.
zh: 天空不会晴朗。

en: The weather won't be fine.
zh: 天气不会好。

en: It won't clear up.
zh: 天不会放晴。

en: It seems to be clearing up.
zh: 看来天要放晴了。

en: The weather clearing, he went out for a walk.
zh: 天气放晴了，他出去散步了。

en: The weather cleared up, so he went out for a walk.
zh: 天气放晴了，所以他出去散步了。

en: The weather having cleared up, he went out for a walk.
zh: 天气放晴了，他出去散步了。

en: The weather clearing up, he went out for a walk.
zh: 天气放晴了，他出去散步了。

en: The weather is clearing up. I needn't have brought an umbrella.
zh: 天气正在放晴。我本来没必要带伞的。

en: The skies are clear.
zh: 天空晴朗。

en: The sky is clear.
zh: 天空晴朗。

en: It's a clear day.
zh: 今天是个晴朗的日子。

en: It's going to clear up.
zh: 天要放晴了。

en: It was sunny and warm.
zh: 那天阳光明媚，很暖和。

en: The stars were brilliant in the clear night sky.
zh: 在晴朗的夜空中，星星闪闪发光。

en: Nothing is so pleasant as taking a walk along the seaside on a fine day.
zh: 在晴朗的日子里，沿着海边散步是最令人愉快的。

en: On a clear day, you can see Mt. Fuji.
zh: 在晴朗的日子里，你可以看到富士山。

en: Nothing is so pleasant as going on a picnic on a fine day.
zh: 在晴朗的日子里，去野餐是最令人愉快的。

en: It was a fine day and there were no clouds in the sky.
zh: 那天天气很好，天空万里无云。

en: It was a fine day so I went on a picnic.
zh: 那天天气很好，所以我去野餐了。

en: Nothing is more pleasant than to take a walk on a fine spring day.
zh: 在晴朗的春天散步是最令人愉快的。

en: Look at the clear sky.
zh: 看看这晴朗的天空。

en: It being fine, we started climbing Mt Fuji.
zh: 因为天气晴朗，我们开始攀登富士山。

en: I think it will be sunny.
zh: 我觉得会是晴天。

en: Frequently clear and balmy weather deteriorates and it soon rains cats and dogs.
zh: 经常晴朗温暖的天气会恶化，很快就会下倾盆大雨。

en: The sky is likely to clear up.
zh: 天空可能会放晴。

en: It looks like it'll clear up.
zh: 看起来天要放晴了。

en: Mr Hoshino is hard to please.
zh: 星野先生很难取悦。

en: Mr. Hoshino is hard to please.
zh: 星野先生很难取悦。

en: According to the stars, she and I aren't supposed to have much chemistry between us.
zh: 根据星象，我和她之间似乎没有什么化学反应。

en: The asterisks mark important references.
zh: 星号标记了重要的参考文献。

en: Not a star was to be seen.
zh: 一颗星星也看不见。

en: It is interesting to look at the stars.
zh: 看星星很有趣。

en: Star-watching is good for your eyes.
zh: 看星星对眼睛有好处。

en: It is interesting to watch stars.
zh: 看星星很有趣。

en: The stars look dim because of the city lights.
zh: 由于城市灯光，星星看起来很暗淡。
